heading: # Looks like you’re not eligible
subheading: ### Based on the answers you gave us you **don’t meet the basic eligibility criteria** for Comic Relief applicants.
copy1: [Read more about this](http://www.comicrelief.com/link-tbc) or [Take the checker again](/)

heading: # You could be eligible!
subheading: ### Based on the answers you gave you meet the **basic eligibility criteria** for Comic Relief applicants.
copy1: ### We fund work across four programme areas: **Children Survive & Thrive**, **Global Mental Health matters**, **Fighting for Gender Justice** and **A Safe Place to Be**. Specific funding opportunities may have additional eligibility criteria, you’ll find them listed in the detailed information about it.
copy2: When considering the amount of funding applied for we will consider the following:
**Proportion of income:** The amount applied for per year must be less than 35% of your income on your most recent set of signed annual accounts
**Capital costs** must make up less than 30% of the total amount applied for in your application. Read more about our approach here.

**Direct Funding**: We prioritise funding applications direct from in-country delivery organisations. If you are not a direct delivery partner we expect to see clear evidence of how the you are adding value, clear partnership roles and responsibilities, and defined power relationships
